overview: A classic performance from a 100 crazy Skid Row. A Brazilian TV-apperance from the Hollywood rock show taped during their Slave to the grind tour in 1992. Setlist: Slave to .. - Big Guns - Here I am - 18 and life - Drum solo - Makin  39; a mess - Psycho therapy - Wasted time - Psycho love - Tornado - Mudkicker - Get the fuck out - Monkey business - I remember you - In a darkened room - Youth gone wild
title: Skid Row: Live in Brazil 1992
